modVersion.name: Version
modVersion.hint: Currently installed module version (can't be changed here).

debug.name: Debug mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging.

isActive.name: Activate lock
isActive.hint: Turn sheet lock state ON (can be toggled in game via keybinding, macros or UI button).

allowEquip.name: Allow equip & unequip
allowEquip.hint: Should equipping/unequipping of inventory items be allowed while sheet lock is active?

showUIButton.name: Show UI button
showUIButton.hint: Display a button in the scene controls menu on the left hand for toggling lock state on and off.

hideChatInfo.name: Hide module info in chat window
hideChatInfo.hint: Hides the info text about this module in the chat window on game start (uncheck this option to see it once more).

notifyOnChange.name: UI messages on toggle
notifyOnChange.hint: Show temporary UI messages whenever toggling on and off.

notifyPermanentlyWhileLOCKED.name: Sticky screen message on activate
notifyPermanentlyWhileLOCKED.hint: Show permanent UI message when toggling ON (visible until deactivation). Needs option "UI messages on toggle" to be enabled.

notifyPermanentlyWhileUNLOCKED.name: Sticky screen message on deactivate
notifyPermanentlyWhileUNLOCKED.hint: Show permanent UI message when toggling OFF (visible until reactivation). Needs option "UI messages on toggle" to be enabled.

alertGMOnReject.name: Alert GM about rejected edits
alertGMOnReject.hint: Show a sceen warning for the GM whenever a player tries to edit a locked sheet.

lockForGM.name: Also lock changes for the GM
lockForGM.hint: Same rules for all! Apply locking to me as the GM as well (protecting myself from accidental edits).

showOverlayLocked.name: Show icons on locked actors
showOverlayLocked.hint: Display an icon on tokens and actors when locked (Default: OFF)

showOverlayOpen.name: Show icons on unlocked actors
showOverlayOpen.hint: Display an icon on tokens and actors when unlocked (Default: ON)

overlayScale.name: Icon size
overlayScale.hint: Scale of the icons on locked/unlocked actors in scene view.

chatInfoContent.title:
Lock The Sheets!
(by coffiarts)
chatInfoContent.text1:
Be the gatekeeper!
Lock and unlock all character sheets at once with just one click!
chatInfoContent.text2: With this nice little helper module the Game Master can block and unblock any edits to character sheets by the players.
chatInfoContent.text3:
Toggling on/off works in various ways: By game settings, or with a nice UI Button (optional), or by macro code or macro button.

Refer to the module preferences under game settings.

Find more details on GitHub
chatInfoContent.footer: This chat card will only be shown once. Activate once more in the module settings if needed.
